meanings.sent1: The gluey paper stuck to my fingers.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were gluey after the craft project.
meanings.sent3: The gluey situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His words were like gluey promises, hard to shake off.
meanings.sent5: The gluey mess on the table was impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: Having the consistency or texture of glue.
meanings.sent1: The gluey substance dripped slowly from the bottle.
meanings.sent2: The dough became gluey as she kneaded it.
meanings.sent3: The gluey texture surprised my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The gluey feeling of the mud on my shoes slowed me down.
meanings.sent5: The gluey consistency of the mixture made it perfect for the project.
